overview: Ride with the Motorbikin Team as they tackle the first unsupported crossing of the Madigan Line in history  Also words of wisdom from Safari Legend Vince Strang on how to build a hot DR 650.  And as an added bonus, ride with Markymark and his funky bunch on a rain soaked tour of South Oz where you'll learn how to make a set of bumless chaps out of a garbage bag!
title: Motorbikin' 4: The Madigan Line
